# Security Policy

## Supported versions

| Version | Supported |
| --- | --- |
| `main` | Yes |
| Tagged releases (`v*`) | Yes |
| Other branches | No |

## Reporting a vulnerability

Do not open public issues for vulnerabilities.

1. Use GitHub Security Advisories:
   - https://github.com/COPUR/enterprise-loan-management-system/security/advisories/new
2. Include:
   - Affected module/path
   - Reproduction details
   - Impact assessment
   - Suggested fix (if available)
3. Expect acknowledgement within 2 business days and triage status after validation.

## Disclosure process

- We follow coordinated disclosure.
- Fixes are prioritized by severity and exploitability.
- Security patches are released with release notes and mitigation guidance.
